tooltips.name: Just a name of the filter.
tooltips.subject:
Use wildcard *:

text* - starts with text,
*text* - contains text,
*text - ends with text.
tooltips.bodyContains: Body of email contains any of specified words or phrases.
tooltips.from: Emails being sent from the specified address. Leave empty if not needed.
tooltips.to: Emails being sent to the specified address. Leave empty if not needed.
tooltips.parent: Leave it empty to apply this filter globally (to all incoming emails).
